layout_rules.reading_flow: Focus on 3D Object -> Read Gemini Tip

generation_prompts.one_liner: macro product photography of a [INSERT OBJECT HERE] constructed from multi-layered matte cardstock in a shadow-box diorama, subsurface scattering paper texture, chiaroscuro lighting with tyndall rays, deep distinct focal planes, global illumination, intricate die-cut details, whimsical narrative composition, 8k, octane render, iso 100, f/2.8, minimal negative space on right side
generation_prompts.negative: screen grabs, UI, laptop, photography, text overlay, chaotic, low resolution, glossy, metallic, Gemini 3, model numbers, watermark, noise, grunge, dark background, complex pattern, 3d render artifacts

directing_dna.custom_style_description: Multi-layered matte cardstock shadow-box diorama, chiaroscuro lighting with tyndall rays, subsurface scattering paper texture, deep focal planes, whimsical narrative composition, warm cream tones.
